Asset.Title: Fade Center
Asset.Description: Overlay that fades to the center.
Asset.Template: <Canvas xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/client/2007" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" Width="220" Height="180"> <Canvas.Resources> <Storyboard x:Name="InTransition" Duration="00:00:01"> <DoubleAnimation x:Name="MainIn" Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.Opacity)" From="0" To="1" Duration="00:00:01" /> <DoubleAnimation x:Name="SubIn" Storyboard.TargetName="SubTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.Opacity)" From="0" To="1" Duration="00:00:01" /> </Storyboard> <Storyboard x:Name="OutTransition" Duration="00:00:01"> <DoubleAnimation x:Name="MainOut" Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.Opacity)" From="1" To="0" Duration="00:00:01" /> <DoubleAnimation x:Name="SubOut" Storyboard.TargetName="SubTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.Opacity)" From="1" To="0" Duration="00:00:01" /> </Storyboard> </Canvas.Resources> <Canvas x:Name="Content" Width="220" Height="180" Canvas.Left="0" Canvas.Top="0"> <TextBlock x:Name="MainTextField" Canvas.Left="-40" Canvas.Top="0" TextAlignment="Center" Width="220" Opacity="0" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic" FontSize="12.6731" Text="{Binding Path=[MainText], FallbackValue=MainText}" Foreground="#FFFFFFFF"> <TextBlock.RenderTransform> <TransformGroup> <MatrixTransform Matrix="1.33333,0,0,1.33333,0,65.7744"/> </TransformGroup> </TextBlock.RenderTransform> </TextBlock> <TextBlock x:Name="SubTextField" Canvas.Left="-40" Canvas.Top="0" TextAlignment="Center" Width="220" Opacity="0" FontFamily="Segoe UI" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic" FontSize="10.4597" Text="{Binding Path=[SubText], FallbackValue=SubText}" Foreground="#FFFFFFFF"> <TextBlock.RenderTransform> <TransformGroup> <MatrixTransform Matrix="1.33333,0,0,1.33333,0,88.6763"/> </TransformGroup> </TextBlock.RenderTransform> </TextBlock> </Canvas> </Canvas>

Asset.Title: Scrolling Center
Asset.Description: Overlay that scrolls to the center.
Asset.Template: <Canvas xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/client/2007" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" Width="220" Height="180" Background="Black" > <Canvas.Resources> <Storyboard x:Name="InTransition" Duration="00:00:01"> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[3].(TranslateTransform.X)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:00.5000000" Value="0"> <!--<SplineDoubleKeyFrame.KeySpline> <KeySpline ControlPoint1="0,0" ControlPoint2="0,1"/> </SplineDoubleKeyFrame.KeySpline>--> </SplineDoubleKeyFrame> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="SubTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[3].(TranslateTransform.X)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:00.5000000" Value="0"> <!--<SplineDoubleKeyFrame.KeySpline> <KeySpline ControlPoint1="0,0" ControlPoint2="0,1"/> </SplineDoubleKeyFrame.KeySpline>--> </SplineDoubleKeyFrame> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </Storyboard> <Storyboard x:Name="OutTransition" Duration="00:00:01"> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[3].(TranslateTransform.X)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:00.5000000" Value="-200"> <!--<SplineDoubleKeyFrame.KeySpline> <KeySpline ControlPoint1="1,0" ControlPoint2="1,1"/> </SplineDoubleKeyFrame.KeySpline>--> </SplineDoubleKeyFrame> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="SubTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[3].(TranslateTransform.X)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:00.5000000" Value="-200"> <!--<SplineDoubleKeyFrame.KeySpline> <KeySpline ControlPoint1="1,0" ControlPoint2="1,1"/> </SplineDoubleKeyFrame.KeySpline>--> </SplineDoubleKeyFrame> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </Storyboard> </Canvas.Resources> <Canvas x:Name="Content" Width="220" Height="180" Canvas.Left="0" Canvas.Top="0"> <TextBlock x:Name="MainTextField" Canvas.Left="0" Canvas.Top="0" RenderTransformOrigin="0.5,0.5" TextAlignment="Center" Width="220" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic" FontSize="{Binding Path=[FontSize], FallbackValue=10}" Text="{Binding Path=[MainText], FallbackValue=MainText}" Foreground="#FFFFFFFF"> <TextBlock.RenderTransform> <TransformGroup> <ScaleTransform ScaleX="1.3333300352096558" ScaleY="1.3333300352096558"/> <SkewTransform/> <RotateTransform/> <TranslateTransform x:Name="MainTextTranslate" X="-200" Y="69"/> </TransformGroup> </TextBlock.RenderTransform> </TextBlock> <TextBlock x:Name="SubTextField" Canvas.Left="0" Canvas.Top="0" RenderTransformOrigin="0.5,0.5" TextAlignment="Center" Width="220" FontFamily="Segoe UI" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic" FontSize="{Binding Path=[FontSize], FallbackValue=10}" Text="{Binding Path=[SubText], FallbackValue=SubText}" Foreground="#FFFFFFFF"> <TextBlock.RenderTransform> <TransformGroup> <ScaleTransform ScaleX="1.3333300352096558" ScaleY="1.3333300352096558"/> <SkewTransform/> <RotateTransform/> <TranslateTransform x:Name="SubTextTranslate" X="-200" Y="91"/> </TransformGroup> </TextBlock.RenderTransform> </TextBlock> </Canvas> </Canvas>

Asset.Title: Spinner
Asset.Template: <Canvas xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/client/2007" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008" xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" Width="220" Height="180" mc:Ignorable="d"> <Canvas.Resources> <Storyboard x:Name="InTransition" Duration="00:00:01"> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames BeginTime="00:00:00" Storyboard.TargetName="Spinner" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.Opacity)"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="1" KeySpline="0.5,0,0.5,1"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames BeginTime="00:00:00" Storyboard.TargetName="Spinner" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[2].(RotateTransform.Angle)"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="0" KeySpline="0.5,0,0.5,1"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames BeginTime="00:00:00" Storyboard.TargetName="Spinner" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[0].(ScaleTransform.ScaleX)"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="1" KeySpline="0.5,0,0.5,1"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames BeginTime="00:00:00" Storyboard.TargetName="Spinner" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[0].(ScaleTransform.ScaleY)"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="1" KeySpline="0.5,0,0.5,1"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </Storyboard> <Storyboard x:Name="OutTransition" Duration="00:00:01"> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames BeginTime="00:00:00" Storyboard.TargetName="Spinner" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[2].(RotateTransform.Angle)"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeySpline="0,0,0.5,1" KeyTime="00:00:00" Value="0"/> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="-180"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames BeginTime="00:00:00" Storyboard.TargetName="Spinner" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[0].(ScaleTransform.ScaleX)"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeySpline="0,0,0.5,1" KeyTime="00:00:00" Value="1"/> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="0.10000000149011612"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames BeginTime="00:00:00" Storyboard.TargetName="Spinner" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[0].(ScaleTransform.ScaleY)"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeySpline="0,0,0.5,1" KeyTime="00:00:00" Value="1"/> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="0.10000000149011612"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames BeginTime="00:00:00" Storyboard.TargetName="Spinner" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.Opacity)"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeySpline="0,0,0.5,1" KeyTime="00:00:00" Value="1"/> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="0"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </Storyboard> </Canvas.Resources> <Canvas x:Name="Content" Width="220" Height="180" Canvas.Left="0" Canvas.Top="0"> <Grid x:Name="Spinner" Width="220" HorizontalAlignment="Center" VerticalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,77,0,0" Opacity="0" RenderTransformOrigin="0.5,0.5"> <Grid.RenderTransform> <TransformGroup> <ScaleTransform ScaleX="0.1" ScaleY="0.1"/> <SkewTransform/> <RotateTransform Angle="-180"/> <TranslateTransform/> </TransformGroup> </Grid.RenderTransform> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="0.5*"/> <RowDefinition Height="0.5*"/> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <TextBlock x:Name="MainTextField" TextAlignment="Center" Width="220" d:LayoutOverrides="Height" RenderTransformOrigin="0.5,0.5" VerticalAlignment="Center" Grid.RowSpan="1" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic" FontSize="12.6731" Text="{Binding Path=[MainText], FallbackValue=MainText}" Foreground="#FFFFFFFF"/> <TextBlock x:Name="SubTextField" TextAlignment="Center" Width="220" d:LayoutOverrides="Height" RenderTransformOrigin="0.5,0.5" VerticalAlignment="Center" FontFamily="Segoe UI" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic" FontSize="10.4597" Text="{Binding Path=[SubText], FallbackValue=SubText}" Foreground="#FFFFFFFF" Grid.Row="1"/> </Grid> </Canvas> </Canvas>

Asset.Title: Zoom Center
Asset.Description: Overlay that zooms to the center.
Asset.Template: <Canvas xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/client/2007" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" Width="220" Height="180"> <Canvas.Resources> <Storyboard x:Name="InTransition" Duration="00:00:01"> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.Opacity)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="1"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="SubTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.Opacity)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="1"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[0].(ScaleTransform.ScaleX)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="1.3333"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="SubTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[0].(ScaleTransform.ScaleX)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="1.3333"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[0].(ScaleTransform.ScaleY)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="1.333"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="SubTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[0].(ScaleTransform.ScaleY)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="1.333"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[3].(TranslateTransform.X)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="39"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[3].(TranslateTransform.Y)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="52"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </Storyboard> <Storyboard x:Name="OutTransition" Duration="00:00:01"> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.Opacity)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="0"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="SubTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.Opacity)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="0"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[0].(ScaleTransform.ScaleX)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="0.10000000149011612"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="SubTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[0].(ScaleTransform.ScaleX)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="0.10000000149011612"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[0].(ScaleTransform.ScaleY)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="0.10000000149011612"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="SubTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[0].(ScaleTransform.ScaleY)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="0.10000000149011612"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[3].(TranslateTransform.X)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="39"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> <DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames Storyboard.TargetName="MainTextField" Storyboard.TargetProperty="(UIElement.RenderTransform).(TransformGroup.Children)[3].(TranslateTransform.Y)" BeginTime="00:00:00"> <SplineDoubleKeyFrame KeyTime="00:00:01" Value="69"/> </DoubleAnimationUsingKeyFrames> </Storyboard> </Canvas.Resources> <Canvas x:Name="Content" Width="220" Height="180" Canvas.Left="0" Canvas.Top="0"> <TextBlock x:Name="MainTextField" Text="{Binding Path=[MainText], FallbackValue=MainText}" FontFamily="Segoe UI" FontSize="12.673100471496582" FontStretch="Normal" FontStyle="Italic" FontWeight="Bold" Foreground="#FFFFFFFF" Canvas.Left="-5.181" Canvas.Top="12.5" HorizontalAlignment="Left" VerticalAlignment="Center" Width="135.698" RenderTransformOrigin="0.495000004768372,0.490000009536743" TextAlignment="Center" Opacity="0"> <TextBlock.RenderTransform> <TransformGroup> <ScaleTransform x:Name="MainTextScale" ScaleX="0.1" ScaleY="0.1"/> <SkewTransform/> <RotateTransform/> <TranslateTransform x:Name="MainTextTranslate" X="39" Y="69"/> </TransformGroup> </TextBlock.RenderTransform> </TextBlock> <TextBlock x:Name="SubTextField" FontFamily="Segoe UI" FontWeight="Bold" FontStyle="Italic" FontSize="10.4597" Text="{Binding Path=[SubText], FallbackValue=SubText}" Foreground="#FFFFFFFF" Canvas.Left="-5.694" Canvas.Top="0" Width="102.938" RenderTransformOrigin="0.5,0.5" TextAlignment="Center" Opacity="0"> <TextBlock.RenderTransform> <TransformGroup> <ScaleTransform x:Name="SubTextScale" ScaleX="0.1" ScaleY="0.1"/> <SkewTransform/> <RotateTransform/> <TranslateTransform x:Name="SubTextTranslate" X="54" Y="91"/> </TransformGroup> </TextBlock.RenderTransform> </TextBlock> </Canvas> </Canvas>
